title: Zombie (feat. Rich Brian)
lyrics:
I woke up like a zombie
I dance like a zombie
Get brain like zombie
I'm flexing like a zombie
Cold heart cash only
No love no mercy

I woke up like a zombie

I dance like a zombie



混的好哦

不是巧合

看我们手腕

带一样表哦

B2k

We pretty ricky

Lap dance on my body

I'm your young daddy

我没在恐吓你

你不懂我每天过的多funny?

IPhone X 把我面部识别去 5 star hotel 呆个两夜

Whip my wrist got different color ice

Cuba chain got 印度国王style

珠宝商说一般人他不卖

请把我当一般人

但他不敢

我是Superman你是Batman

正义联盟 oh my Higher Gang

先去拯救世界 I be right back

The way I talk, I know you like that

如此的帅气 东南亚的姑娘都很like me

必须承认看到我就想笑

有我加入 派对更不无聊



I woke up like a zombie

I dance like a zombie

Get brain like zombie

I'm flexing like a zombie

Cold heart cash only

No love no mercy

I woke up like a zombie

I dance like a zombie



Walking like, feeling like, eating like, really might

Hit her up, eat her out like a zombie

I'm outside walking 'round with a price on my head

Better not think about plotting on me

Ay, I'ma win a race, in a candy paint, bumping on the bass

Sit back every time they hit me with a case

You don't want no smoke, I'm smoking on the lace

Uh, she gon' move around, shaking up the ground, moving on her waist

On her knees but she not giving any praise

We just broke up but she basic anyways

Uh, always on my case but every single day you wishing for a raise

Getting in my face, spray you with the mace

You remind me of the pussy that I ate

Uh, this shit ain't a game, catch you slipping in the rain

Lying, talking 'bout the motherfucking gats you finna spray

My AirBNB is a military base

When I'm done with you, I'll make your mama say, "He was a saint"



I woke up like a zombie

I dance like a zombie

Get brain like zombie

I'm flexing like a zombie

Cold heart cash only

No love no mercy

I woke up like a zombie

I dance like a zombie



身份和地位的象征 就是我的表

全新的劳力士 用它来倒计时

手机的作用是看银行的存款有七位数

买了新珠宝的价值都不菲 灯光下闪亮到出水

马来西亚 a milly rock

香港泰国 加拿大

所有女孩super hot, 88 rising up

我左手时间十点半

右手时间过得有点慢

醒来 洗澡 吃点饭

活在两个不同 时间段

我飞了八万公里

呼吸热带空气

一出现就有太多人在周围拥挤

他们最喜欢的rapper

只有higher兄弟

倾家荡产乘以二十倍

没有我的一段verse贵

My flow like a butterfly

9.0级海底earthquake



I woke up like a zombie

I dance like a zombie

Get brain like zombie

I'm flexing like a zombie

Cold heart cash only

No love no mercy

I woke up like a zombie

I dance like a zombie
